subject: Simsonn GT2 Racing Simulator Steering Wheel S1 - Order #SSN1802
description_text:
Hi,

I was just looking to inquire - would it be possible to return the Suede Steering wheel in exchange for the leather version?

I am enjoying Simsonn GT2, especially the button box however I am finding the suede of the wheel to be quite rough on my hands, I was just wondering if it would be possible to swap to the leather. I do not wish to return the whole product as it is quite good.

Many thanks,
Karl

conversations.body_text: Hi Karl Byrne,  It can't be replaced. Without the HUB, the suede and leather steering wheels themselves aren't very valuable—the main cost comes from the shipping.

Many thanks for getting back to me so promptly.

Is it at all possible to purchase a leather wheel and I can pay for shipping? No problem if not!

Regards,
Karl
________________________________
